achievement: Individual Item Counting with 76.4% Validated Accuracy
capability: Detects '4 bananas, 3 apples, 6 bottles' with individual counting

lessons_learned.spatial_coordinates: Cannot generate bounding boxes from text descriptions
lessons_learned.training_complexity: Computer vision requires manual annotation expertise
